verses.roman:
jaya jaya śrīvāsādi yata bhakta-gaṇa
śrī-kṛṣṇa-caitanya prabhu--yāṅra prāṇa-dhana

synonyms: jaya jaya—all glories; śrīvāsa-ādi—headed by Śrīvāsa Ṭhākura; yata bhakta-gaṇa—to all the devotees; śrī-kṛṣṇa-caitanya prabhu—Śrī Caitanya Mahāprabhu; yāṅra—whose; prāṇa-dhana—life and soul.
translation: All glories to all the devotees, headed by Śrīvāsa Ṭhākura. Śrī Kṛṣṇa Caitanya Mahāprabhu is their life and soul.
